original_text: Jesus knew that they wanted to ask him about this. So he said to them, ‘I said, “After a short time, you will not see me. But soon after that, you will see me again.” Perhaps you are asking each other about that.
korean_text: 예수께서 그 묻고자 함을 아시고 이르시되 내 말이 조금 있으면 나를 보지 못하겠고 또 조금 있으면 나를 보리라 하므로 서로 문의하느냐

sentences.original_text: Jesus knew that they wanted to ask him about this.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 그들이 이것에 대해 자신에게 질문하기를 원한다는 것을 알고 계셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: "After a short time, you will not see me.
But soon after that, you will see me again."
sentences.korean_translation: "하지만 그 후에는 곧 나를 다시 보게 될 것이다."'

sentences.original_text: Perhaps you are asking each other about that.
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 너희는 그것에 대해 서로에게 질문하고 있을 것이다.
